selectedVerses.text: And the men of Gibeon sent to Joshua at the camp in Gilgal, saying, "Do not relax your hand from your servants. Come up to us quickly and save us and help us, for all the kings of the Amorites who dwell in the hill country are gathered against us."
And I will say to my soul, Soul, you have ample goods laid up for many years; relax, eat, drink, be merry.'
